#include <queue>#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 2000 + 7;const int M = 10000 + 7;struct Edge {    int to;    int w;    int nxt;};Edge edge[M];int head[N], idx = 1;// æœ€çŸ­è·¯int dis[N]; bool inque[N]; // å­˜çš„æ˜¯å½“å‰è¯¥ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦åœ¨é˜Ÿåˆ—å½“ä¸­ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­åŒæ—¶å­˜åœ¨é‡å¤çš„ç‚¹// åˆ¤è´Ÿç¯int cnt[N];                // cnt[]è®°å½•dis[]æ›´æ–°æ¬¡æ•°int n, m;inline void add(int from, int to, int w) {    edge[idx].to = to, edge[idx].w = w, edge[idx].nxt = head[from];    head[from] = idx ++;}bool spfa() {    memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof dis);    dis[1] = 0;        queue<int> q;    // q.push(1);    // inque[1] = true;    // å¯èƒ½è¿™ä¸ªè´Ÿç¯ä»æºç‚¹1æ˜¯åˆ°ä¸äº†çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤åˆå§‹æ—¶è¦æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹éƒ½æ”¾è¿›que    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        q.push(i);        inque[i] = true;    }        while (!q.empty()) {        int u = q.front(); q.pop();                inque[u] = false;                for (int i = head[u]; ~i; i = edge[i].nxt) {            int v = edge[i].to, w = edge[i].w;            if (dis[v] > dis[u] + w) {                dis[v] = dis[u] + w;                cnt[v] = cnt[u] + 1;                // dis[]æ›´æ–°æ¬¡æ•° >= nï¼Œè¯´æ˜å­˜åœ¨è´Ÿç¯                if (cnt[v] >= n) return true;                if (!inque[v]) inque[v] = true, q.push(v);             }        }    }        return false;}int main() {    memset(head, -1, sizeof head);        cin >> n >> m;    for(int i = 1; i <= m; i ++) {        int u, v, w;        scanf("%d %d %d", &u, &v, &w);        add(u, v, w);    }        if(spfa()) puts("Yes");    else puts("No");        return 0;}

dist[k, i , j ]è¡¨ç¤ºä»ç‚¹iå¼€å§‹ï¼Œåªç»è¿‡1~kè¿™äº›ä¸­é—´ç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ°ç‚¹jçš„æœ€çŸ­è·ç¦»

è¿™ç”šè‡³ä¸éœ€è¦ç‰¹æ„å­˜å›¾ï¼Œå› ä¸ºdistæ•°ç»„æœ¬èº«å°±å¯ä»¥ä»é‚»æ¥çŸ©é˜µæ‹“å±•è€Œæ¥ã€‚åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠæ¯ä¸ªç‚¹åˆ°è‡ªå·±çš„è·ç¦»è®¾ä¸º0ï¼Œæ¯æ–°å¢ä¸€æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œå°±æŠŠä»è¿™æ¡è¾¹çš„èµ·ç‚¹åˆ°ç»ˆç‚¹çš„è·ç¦»è®¾ä¸ºæ­¤è¾¹çš„è¾¹æƒï¼ˆç±»ä¼¼äºé‚»æ¥çŸ©é˜µï¼‰ã€‚å…¶ä»–è·ç¦»åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ºINFï¼ˆä¸€ä¸ªè¶…è¿‡è¾¹æƒæ•°æ®èŒƒå›´çš„å¤§æ•´æ•°ï¼Œæ³¨æ„é˜²æ­¢æº¢å‡ºï¼‰ã€‚

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 200 + 7;const int M = 20000 + 7;const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int dist[N][N];int n, m;int Q; // Qè¡¨ç¤ºè¯¢é—®æ¬¡æ•°void floyd() {    for (int k = 1; k <= n; k ++) {        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j ++) {                dist[i][j] = min(dist[i][j], dist[i][k] + dist[k][j]);            }        }    }}int main() {    cin >> n >> m >> Q;    // é‚»æ¥çŸ©é˜µåˆå§‹åŒ–    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j ++) {            if(i == j) dist[i][j] = 0;            else dist[i][j] = INF;        }    }        for(int i = 1; i <= m; i ++) {        int u, v, w;        scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w);        // é€šå¸¸åªä¿ç•™æœ€çŸ­è¾¹        dist[u][v] = min (dist[u][v], w);    }         floyd();        while (Q --) {        int a, b;        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);        if (dist[a][b] > INF / 2) puts("impossible");        else printf("%d\n", dist[a][b]);    }        return 0;}

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>   // memset()#include <stdlib.h>  // rand()#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 7;const int M = 1e5 + 7;struct Edge{    int to;    // åªå­˜å‚¨å½“å‰è¾¹çš„ç»ˆç‚¹    int w;     // æƒå€¼ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ— æƒå›¾å¯ä»¥æ²¡æœ‰wæˆ–è€…wç½®ä¸º1    int nxt;   // å½“å‰ç»“ç‚¹åœ¨é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„ç¼–å·idx};// headèŠ‚ç‚¹int head[N];// headå±•å¼€çš„é‚»æ¥è¡¨Edge edge[M];int idx;/*addæ“ä½œ: from->toè¿™æ¡è¾¹çš„æƒé‡ä¸ºw*/inline void add(int from, int to, int w) {    edge[idx].to = to;    edge[idx].w = w;    edge[idx].nxt = head[from];    head[from] = idx ++; }int n, m;int main() {// ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶éœ€è¦åˆå§‹åŒ–head[]ä¸º-1ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºhead[]çš„nxtæŒ‡é’ˆä¸ºNULL    memset(head, -1, sizeof head);        cin >> n >> m;        // add    while (m --) {        int u, v, w;        scanf("%d%d%d", &u, &v, &w);                add(u, v, w);               // add(v, u, w) // æ— å‘å›¾éœ€è¦é¢å¤–åç€æ“ä½œä¸€æ¬¡    }        // å›¾çš„éå†    for (int t = 1; t <= n; t ++) {        if (head[t] != -1) printf("%d: ", t);        for (int i = head[t]; i != -1; i = edge[i].nxt) {            printf("->%d(%d) ", edge[i].to, edge[i].w);            // å–jè¿›è¡Œåç»­æ“ä½œ        int j = edge[i].to;        }        if (head[t] != -1) puts("");    }        return 0;}

#include <queue>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 7;const int M = N;struct Edge{    int to;    int w;    int nxt;};Edge edge[N];int head[N], idx = 1;int deg[N], seq[N]; // æœ‰å‘æ— ç¯å›¾çš„æ‹“æ‰‘æ’åº: å…¥åº¦degï¼Œæ‹“æ‰‘åºåˆ—seqint n, m;inline void add(int from, int to, int w) {    edge[idx].to = to, edge[idx].w = w, edge[idx].nxt = head[from];    head[from] = idx ++;    deg[to] ++;}bool top_sort() {    queue<int> q;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        if (deg[i] == 0) q.push(i);    }        int cnt = 0;    while (!q.empty()) {        int t = q.front(); q.pop();       seq[++ cnt] = t;                for (int i = head[t]; ~i; i = edge[i].nxt) {            int j = edge[i].to;            deg[j] --;            if (deg[j] == 0) {                q.push(j);            }        }    }        return cnt == n;}int main() {    memset(head, -1, sizeof head);    memset(deg, 0, sizeof deg);        cin >> n >> m;    for (int i = 0; i < m; i ++) {        int u, v;        scanf("%d %d", &u, &v);        add(u, v, 1);    }        if (top_sort()) {        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {            printf("%d ", seq[i]);        }    }    else puts("-1");}

string s = to_string(n);int m = s.size();int cache[m][1 << 10];memset(cache, -1, sizeof(cache)); function<int(int, int, bool, bool)> f = [&](int i, int mask, bool is_limit, bool is_num) -> int {    // boundary    if (i == m) {        return is_num; // is_num ä¸º true è¡¨ç¤ºå¾—åˆ°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•æ•°å­—    }    // cache    if (!is_limit && is_num && cache[i][mask] != -1) {        return cache[i][mask];    }    int res = 0;    if (!is_num) {        res = f(i + 1, mask, false, false);    }    int low = is_num ? 0 : 1;    int up = is_limit ? s[i] - '0' : 9;    for (int d = low; d <= up; ++d) {        if ((mask >> d & 1) == 0) {            res += f(i + 1, mask | (1 << d), is_limit && d == up, true);        }    }    if (!is_limit && is_num) {        cache[i][mask] = res;    }    return res;};return n - f(0, 0, true, false);

æ·éª°å­æ¨¡æ‹Ÿï¼šhttps://leetcode.cn/problems/dice-roll-simulation 2008åˆ†

è¿™é“é¢˜åˆ†åˆ«ç”¨dfsã€è®°å¿†åŒ–æœç´¢ã€dpæ¥åš

dfsã€è®°å¿†åŒ–æœç´¢å±äºé€’å½’æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œdpå±äºé€’æ¨æ–¹æ³•

dfs

dfsçš„ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°

class Solution {    const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;public:    int dieSimulator(int n, vector<int>& rollMax) {        function<int(int, int, int)> dfs = [&](int i, int last, int left) -> int {            if (i == 0) return 1; // æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•ç»“æœ            long long res = 0;            for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {                if (j != last) res += dfs(i - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);                else if (j == last && left > 0) res += dfs(i - 1, j, left - 1);            }            res %= MOD;            return res;        };        long long res = 0;        for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {            res += dfs(n - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);        }        res %= MOD;        return res;    }};

è¿™é“é¢˜åœ¨leetcodeä¸Šï¼Œcacheç”¨æ•°ç»„å¯ä»¥è¿‡ï¼Œç”¨å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä¼šè¶…æ—¶(å› ä¸ºhashå‡½æ•°çš„æ„é€ ä¸æ»¡è¶³ç»“æœçš„å†²çª)ã€‚

è®°å¿†åŒ–æ•°ç»„ä»£ç :

class Solution {    const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;public:    int dieSimulator(int n, vector<int>& rollMax) {        int cache[n][6][15];        memset(cache, -1, sizeof(cache)); // -1è¡¨ç¤ºæ²¡æœ‰è®¿é—®è¿‡                function<int(int, int, int)> dfs = [&](int i, int last, int left) -> int {            if (i == 0) return 1; // æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•ç»“æœ            if (cache[i][last][left] != -1) return cache[i][last][left];            long long res = 0;            for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {                if (j != last) res += dfs(i - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);                else if (j == last && left > 0) res += dfs(i - 1, j, left - 1);            }            res %= MOD;            cache[i][last][left] = res;            return res;        };        long long res = 0;        for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {            res += dfs(n - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);        }        res %= MOD;        return res;    }};

è®°å¿†åŒ–å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ä»£ç :

ç”±äºunordered_mapä¸æ”¯æŒå…ƒç»„ä½œä¸ºkeyå€¼ï¼Œæœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸¤ç§æ–¹å¼:

  • è‡ªå®šä¹‰å…ƒç»„çš„hashå‡½æ•°ä¼ å…¥
  • å°†é€’å½’å…¥å‚å°è£…æˆstringçš„å½¢å¼ encoder = "i last left"

hashå‡½æ•°å‘ç”Ÿçš„å†²çªçš„æ¦‚ç‡è¶Šå°ï¼Œç¨‹åºæ‰§è¡Œæ•ˆç‡è¶Šé«˜ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸€å®šç¨‹åº¦ä¸Šä¼šå½±å“ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œæ•ˆç‡

// è‡ªå®šä¹‰å…ƒç»„çš„hashå‡½æ•°ä¼ å…¥typedef tuple<int, int, int> TIII;typedef long long LL;struct SimpleTupleHash {    std::size_t operator()(const std::tuple<int, int, int>& p) const {        return get<0>(p) ^ get<1>(p) ^ get<2>(p);  // => è¿‡31ä¸ªæ ·ä¾‹         // get<0>(p) ^ get<1>(p) & get<2>(p);      // => è¿‡29ä¸ªæ ·ä¾‹    }};class Solution {    const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;public:    int dieSimulator(int n, vector<int>& rollMax) {        unordered_map<TIII, LL, SimpleTupleHash> cache;                function<int(int, int, int)> dfs = [&](int i, int last, int left) -> int {            if (i == 0) return 1; // æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•ç»“æœ            if (cache.count({i, last, left})) return cache[{i, last, left}];                        LL res = 0;            for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {                if (j != last) res += dfs(i - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);                else if (j == last && left > 0) res += dfs(i - 1, j, left - 1);            }            res %= MOD;            cache[{i, last, left}] = res;            return res;        };        LL res = 0;        for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {            res += dfs(n - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);        }        res %= MOD;        return res;    }};
// å°†é€’å½’å…¥å‚å°è£…æˆstringçš„å½¢å¼typedef long long LL;class Solution {    const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;public:    int dieSimulator(int n, vector<int>& rollMax) {        unordered_map<string, LL> cache;  // => è¿‡29ä¸ªæ ·ä¾‹                function<int(int, int, int)> dfs = [&](int i, int last, int left) -> int {            if (i == 0) return 1; // æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•ç»“æœ            string encoder = to_string(i) + " " + to_string(last) + " " + to_string(left);            if (cache.count(encoder)) return cache[encoder];                        LL res = 0;            for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {                if (j != last) res += dfs(i - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);                else if (j == last && left > 0) res += dfs(i - 1, j, left - 1);            }            res %= MOD;            cache[encoder] = res;            return res;        };        LL res = 0;        for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {            res += dfs(n - 1, j, rollMax[j] - 1);        }        res %= MOD;        return res;    }};

dp

1æ¯”1ç¿»è¯‘æˆé€’æ¨åšæ³•ï¼š

  • è®°å¿†åŒ–æ•°ç»„æ”¹ä¸ºdpçŠ¶æ€æ•°ç»„fff
  • é€’å½’è¾¹ç•Œæ”¹ä¸ºåˆå§‹å€¼
  • é€’å½’å…¥å‚æ”¹ä¸ºå¾ªç¯(æ¯æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…¥å‚ï¼Œå°±æœ‰ä¸€å±‚å¾ªç¯)

çŠ¶æ€: f[i][j][k]f[i][j][k]f[i][j][k]å·²ç»å®Œæˆäº† iiiæ¬¡æ·éª°å­ï¼Œç¬¬ iii æ¬¡æ·çš„æ•°å­—æ˜¯ jjjï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å·²ç»è¿ç»­æ·äº† kkkæ¬¡ jjjçš„åˆæ³•åºåˆ—æ•°

typedef long long LL;class Solution {    const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;public:    int dieSimulator(int n, vector<int>& rollMax) {        // è®°å¿†åŒ–æ”¹dpæ•°ç»„        int f[n][6][15];        memset(f, 0, sizeof f);                // é€’å½’è¾¹ç•Œæ”¹ä¸ºåˆå§‹å€¼        for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {            for (int k = 0; k < rollMax[j]; k ++) {                f[0][j][k] = 1;            }        }        // é€’å½’å…¥å‚æ”¹ä¸ºå¾ªç¯        for (int i = 1; i < n; i ++) {            for (int last = 0; last < 6; last ++) {                for (int left = 0; left < rollMax[last]; left ++) {                    LL res = 0;                    for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {                        if (j != last) res += f[i - 1][j][rollMax[j] - 1];                        else if (j == last && left > 0) res += f[i - 1][j][left - 1];                    }                    res %= MOD;                    f[i][last][left] = res;                 }            }        }        LL res = 0;        for (int j = 0; j < 6; j ++) {            res += f[n - 1][j][rollMax[j] - 1];            res %= MOD;        }        return res;    }};
å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(nmS)O(n m S)O(nmS), å…¶ä¸­ mmm ä¸º rollMaxâ¡\operatorname{rollMax}rollMax çš„é•¿åº¦, å³ 6,S=âˆ‘rollMaxâ¡6, S=\sum \operatorname{rollMax}6,S=âˆ‘rollMax, è¿™ä¸ä¼šè¶… è¿‡ 6Ã—15=906 \times 15=906Ã—15=90 ã€‚åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ === çŠ¶æ€ä¸ªæ•° Ã—\timesÃ— å•ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€çš„è½¬ç§»ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚æœ¬é¢˜ä¸­çŠ¶ æ€ä¸ªæ•°ç­‰äº O(nS)O(n S)O(nS), è€Œå•ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€çš„è½¬ç§»ä¸ªæ•°ä¸º O(m)O(m)O(m), å› æ­¤æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º O(nmS)O(n m S)O(nmS) ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(nS)O(n S)O(nS) ã€‚

class Solution {    const int MOD = 1e9 + 7;public:    int dieSimulator(int n, vector<int> &rollMax) {        int m = rollMax.size(), f[n][m], s[n];        for (int j = 0; j < m; ++j) f[0][j] = 1;        s[0] = m;        for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {            s[i] = 0;            for (int j = 0; j < m; ++j) {                int res = s[i - 1], mx = rollMax[j];                if (i > mx) res -= s[i - mx - 1] - f[i - mx - 1][j];                else if (i == mx) --res;                f[i][j] = (res % MOD + MOD) % MOD; // é˜²æ­¢å‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°                s[i] = (s[i] + f[i][j]) % MOD;            }        }        return s[n - 1];    }};
  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(nm)O(n m)O(nm), å…¶ä¸­ mmm ä¸º rollMaxâ¡\operatorname{rollMax}rollMax çš„é•¿åº¦, å³666ã€‚
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦: O(nm)O(nm)O(nm) ã€‚

ä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ä¸ºNçš„åºåˆ—ï¼Œå…¶å­åŒºé—´ä¸ªæ•°æ˜¾ç„¶æœ‰N2N^2N2ä¸ªï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ ¹æ®å€å¢æ€æƒ³ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é¦–å…ˆåœ¨è¿™O(N2)O(N^2)O(N2)çš„çŠ¶æ€ç©ºé—´ï¼Œé€‰å–ä¸€äº›2çš„æ•´æ•°æ¬¡å¹‚çš„ä½ç½®ä½œä¸ºä»£è¡¨å€¼ã€‚å…·ä½“æ¥è¯´ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼Œé¢„å¤„ç†å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ f[i][j]f[i][j]f[i][j]ï¼Œ f[i][j]f[i][j]f[i][j] è¡¨ç¤ºä» iii å¼€å§‹ã€é•¿åº¦ä¸º 2j2^j2j çš„åŒºé—´ä¸­çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œå³ï¼š

f[i][j]=maxâ¡{ai,ai+1,â€¦,ai+2jâˆ’1}f[i][j] = \max{ \left \{ a_{i},a_{i+1},\ldots,a_{i+2^{j}-1} \right \} }f[i][j]=max{aiâ€‹,ai+1â€‹,â€¦,ai+2jâˆ’1â€‹}

å¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œf[i][j]f[i][j]f[i][j] çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ç»´æ˜¯ä¸‹æ ‡ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒç»´æ˜¯åŒºé—´é•¿åº¦æ‰€å¯¹åº”çš„äºŒè¿›åˆ¶ä½æ•°ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¯¥æ•°ç»„çš„å¤§å° O(nlogâ¡n)O(n\log n)O(nlogn)ã€‚

å»ºç«‹å¥½ f[i][j]f[i][j]f[i][j] æ•°ç»„ä¹‹åï¼ŒåŒºé—´ [l,r][l,r][l,r] çš„æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹æ­¥éª¤æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼š

Step1ï¼šè®¡ç®— k=âŒŠlogâ¡2(râˆ’l+1)âŒ‹k=\lfloor\log_2(r - l + 1)\rfloork=âŒŠlog2â€‹(râˆ’l+1)âŒ‹ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°èƒ½å¤Ÿè¦†ç›–æ•´ä¸ªæŸ¥è¯¢åŒºé—´çš„ã€é•¿åº¦æœ€æ¥è¿‘ä¸”ä¸å¤§äºæŸ¥è¯¢åŒºé—´é•¿åº¦çš„åŒºé—´
Step2ï¼šå–maxâ¡(f[l][k],f[râˆ’2k+1][k])\max{(f[l][k],f[r-2^{k}+1][k])}max(f[l][k],f[râˆ’2k+1][k])ï¼Œä»¥ä¸ºsssä¸ºåŒºé—´é•¿åº¦æ‰€å¯¹åº”çš„äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°ï¼Œæ±‚è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå­åŒºé—´çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼

æ¯æ¬¡è®¡ç®—logâ¡\loglogå¤ªèŠ±æ—¶é—´äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¯¹logâ¡\loglogä¹Ÿè¿›è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡é€’æ¨çš„é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼š

æ¿å­å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 7;struct ST {public:    ST (const vector<int>& a) {        int n = a.size();        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) {            f[i][0] = a[i - 1];        }                // å…ˆæšä¸¾jï¼Œåæšä¸¾i        for (int j = 1; (1 << j) <= n; ++ j) {for (int i = 1; i + (1 << j) - 1 <= n; ++ i) {                f[i][j] = max(f[i][j - 1], f[i + (1 << (j - 1))][j - 1]);            }        }                log2[1] = 0;        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++ i) {            log2[i] = log2[i / 2] + 1;        }    }        int query(int l, int r) {        int k = log2[r - l + 1];  // k = log(r - l + 1)/ log(2); // å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨cmathä¸­çš„log        return max(f[l][k], f[r - (1 << k) + 1][k]);    }private:    int f[N][21]; // ç¬¬äºŒç»´çš„å¤§å°æ ¹æ®æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´å†³å®šï¼Œä¸å°äºlog(N)    int log2[N];};vector<int>a;int n, m;int main() {    cin >> n >> m;    for (int i = 0 ; i < n; ++ i) {        int x;        scanf("%d", &x);        a.push_back(x);    }        ST st(a);        while (m --) {        int l, r;        scanf("%d %d", &l, &r);        printf("%d\n", st.query(l, r));    }        return 0;}

iotaå‡½æ•°ï¼Œç”¨äºèµ‹äºˆè¿ç»­çš„å€¼(Defined in header <numeric>)

ä¸ªäººåˆæ­¥ä½¿ç”¨çš„å¹¶æŸ¥é›†æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰åŠ å…¥æƒé‡ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯ç»Ÿè®¡é›†åˆçš„sizeï¼Œç­‰ä¹‹ååšåˆ°è¿™ç±»æ›´éš¾çš„é¢˜ç›®å†é™„åŠ 

#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <numeric>using namespace std;class UnionFind {private:    vector<int> fa;public:    UnionFind(int n): fa(n) {        iota(fa.begin(), fa.end(), 0); // iotaå‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥æŠŠæ•°ç»„åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸º0åˆ°n-1    };        // æŸ¥æ‰¾fa    int find (int x) {        if (x != fa[x]) fa[x] = find(fa[x]);        return fa[x];    }        // åˆå¹¶    void unite(int x, int y) {        x = find(x), y = find(y);        if (x != y) fa[x] = y;    }        // æ˜¯å¦è¿é€š    bool is_connected(int x, int y) {        x = find(x), y = find(y);        return x == y;    }};int main() {    int n, m;    cin >> n >> m;        UnionFind uf(n + 1);    while (m --) {        char op;        int a, b;        cin >> op;        scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);        if (op == 'M') uf.unite(a, b);        if (op == 'Q') {            if(uf.is_connected(a, b)) {                puts("Yes");            }            else puts("No");        }    }        return 0;}

å¸¦ç»Ÿè®¡é›†åˆçš„sizeçš„æ¿å­

#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <numeric>using namespace std;class UnionFind {private:    vector<int> fa;    vector<int> sz;public:    UnionFind(int n) : fa(n), sz(n, 1) {        iota(fa.begin(), fa.end(), 0);    }        int find(int x) {        if (x != fa[x]) fa[x] = find(fa[x]);        return fa[x];    }        void unite(int x, int y) {        x = find(x), y = find(y);        if (x != y) {            fa[x] = y;            sz[y] += sz[x];        }    }        bool is_connected(int x, int y) {        x = find(x), y = find(y);        return x == y;    }        int get_sz(int x) {        x = find(x);        return sz[x];    }};int main() {    int n, m;    cin >> n >> m;    UnionFind uf(n + 1);        while (m --) {        char op[3];        scanf("%s", op);        if (op[0] == 'C') {            int a, b;            scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);            uf.unite(a, b);        }        if (op[0] == 'Q') {            if (op[1] == '1') {                int a, b;                scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);                if (uf.is_connected(a, b)) {                    puts("Yes");                }                else puts("No");            }            else if (op[1] == '2') {                int a;                scanf("%d", &a);                printf("%d\n", uf.get_sz(a));            }        }    }        return 0;}

entry.title: 0x20å­—ç¬¦ä¸²-(4)-Trie
entry.content:
Trie(å­—å…¸æ ‘)

Trieæ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç”¨æ¥é«˜æ•ˆå­˜å‚¨å’ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é›†åˆçš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚

å­—æ¯çš„ç±»å‹ä¸ä¼šå¾ˆå¤šï¼šè¦ä¹ˆå…¨æ˜¯å°å†™å­—æ¯ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå…¨æ˜¯å¤§å†™å­—æ¯ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå…¨æ˜¯æ•°å­—ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå…¨æ˜¯01ã€‚

é™æ€å®ç°

éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®å®é™…é—®é¢˜ä¸­å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°çš„ç§ç±»æ•°ç›®ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹ALPHABET_SIZEALPHABET\_SIZEALPHABET_SIZEï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½å–26ã€‚

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 7;const int M = N * L;   // Næ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸ªæ•°, Læ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¹³å‡é•¿åº¦const int ALPHABETS_SIZE = 26;struct Trie {private:    int cnt[N];    int son[M][ALPHABETS_SIZE], idx = 0;public:        void insert(const string& s) {        int p = 0;        for (char c : s) {            int t = c - 'a';            if (!son[p][t]) {                son[p][t] = ++ idx;            }            p = son[p][t];        }        cnt[p] ++;    }        int query(const string& s) {        int p = 0;        for (char c : s) {            int t = c - 'a';            if(!son[p][t]) return 0;            p = son[p][t];        }        return cnt[p];    }};

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

å‡è®¾å½“å‰éœ€è¦æ’å…¥æˆ–æŸ¥è¯¢çš„str[]çš„æœ‰æ•ˆé•¿åº¦ä¸ºLLLã€‚

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šinsert()insert()insert()ï¼šO(L)O(L)O(L)ï¼›query()query()query()ï¼šO(L)O(L)O(L)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(Mâˆ—ALPHABET_SIZE)O(M * ALPHABET\_SIZE)O(Mâˆ—ALPHABET_SIZE)ã€‚

åŠ¨æ€å®ç°

åŸºäºvectorå®ç°

éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®å®é™…é—®é¢˜ä¸­å­—ç¬¦å‡ºç°çš„ç§ç±»æ•°ç›®ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹ALPHABET_SIZEALPHABET\_SIZEALPHABET_SIZEï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬éƒ½å–26ã€‚

#include <string>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int ALPHABET_SIZE = 26;struct Trie {private:    int cnt;    vector<Trie*> son;public:    Trie() : cnt(0), son(ALPHABET_SIZE, nullptr) {}    ~Trie() {        for (auto &s : son) {            delete(s);        }    }        void insert(const string& s) {        Trie* p = this;        for (char c : s) {            int t = c - 'a';            if (!p->son[t]) {                p->son[t] = new Trie();            }            p = p->son[t];        }        p->cnt ++;    }        int query(const string & s) {        Trie*p = this;        for (char c : s) {            int t = c - 'a';            if (!p->son[t]) {                return 0;            }            p = p->son[t];        }        return p->cnt;    }        int start_with(const string& s) {        int res = 0;                Trie* p = this;        for (char c : s) {            int t = c - 'a';            if (!p->son[t]){                break;            }            p = p->son[t];            res += p->cnt;        }                return res;    }};

åŸºäºunordered_mapå®ç°

èƒ½å¤ŸåŠ¨æ€è°ƒæ•´å­—ç¬¦ç§ç±»çš„æ•°ç›®ï¼Œæ— éœ€æŠŠå­—ç¬¦æ˜ å°„æˆæ•°å­—ï¼Œä»£ç æ›´ç®€æ´ã€‚

#include <string>#include <unordered_map>using namespace std;struct Trie {private:    int cnt;    unordered_map<char, Trie*> son;public:    Trie() : cnt(0) {}    ~Trie() {        for (auto &s : son) {            delete(s.second);        }    }        void insert(const string& s) {        Trie* p = this;        for (char c : s) {            if (!p->son[c]) {                p->son[c] = new Trie();            }            p = p->son[c];        }        p->cnt ++;    }        int query(const string& s) {        Trie*p = this;        for (char c : s) {            if (!p->son[c]) {                return 0;            }            p = p->son[c];        }        return p->cnt;    }        int start_with(const string& s) {        int res = 0;         Trie* p = this;        for (char c : s) {            if (!p->son[c]){                break;            }            p = p->son[c];            res += p->cnt;        }            return res;    }};

ç®—æ³•ç«èµ›ï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯ç‹é“ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸ªäººä¹ æƒ¯ä½¿ç”¨vectorçš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š

æ—¶é—´è¾ƒå¿«ï¼Œæ¯”unordered_mapç‰ˆæœ¬æ¥è¿‘å¿«1å€è¾ƒæ…¢ï¼Œè¦å¤„ç†hashå†²çª
ç©ºé—´ALPHABET_SIZEALPHABET\_SIZEALPHABET_SIZEå›ºå®šï¼Œä¼šäº§ç”Ÿæ›´å¤šçš„å†…å­˜ç¢ç‰‡å†…å­˜ç¢ç‰‡è¾ƒå°‘

å¤æ‚åº¦åˆ†æ

Trieçš„å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„ä¸ªæ•°å’Œé•¿åº¦æœ‰å…³ã€‚å‡è®¾Trieä¸­åŒ…å«NNNä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œä¸”å¹³å‡å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é•¿åº¦ä¸ºLLLã€‚

  • æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šinsert()insert()insert()ï¼šO(L)O(L)O(L)ï¼›query()query()query()ï¼šO(L)O(L)O(L)ï¼›start_with()start\_with()start_with()ï¼šO(L)O(L)O(L)ï¼Œæ„å»ºTrieä¸ºO(nâˆ—L)O(n*L)O(nâˆ—L)
  • ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(nâˆ—L)O(n*L)O(nâˆ—L)ã€‚

åº”ç”¨ï¼š

01-Trie(01å­—å…¸æ ‘)

çœŸç¥ï¼Œä¸ä¼šè¢«å¡TLE;

const int N = 1e5 + 7, M = N * 31;const int ALPHABETS_SIZE = 2;struct Trie {private:    int son[M][ALPHABETS_SIZE], idx;public:        void insert(int x) {        int p = 0;        for (int i = 30; i >= 0; i --) {            int t = x >> i & 1;            if (!son[p][t]) {                son[p][t] = ++idx;            }            p = son[p][t];        }    }        int query(int x) {        int res = 0;        int p = 0;        for (int i = 30; i >= 0; i --) {            int t = x >> i & 1;            if (son[p][!t]) {                p = son[p][!t];                res = (res << 1) + !t;            }            else {                p = son[p][t];                res = (res << 1) + t;            }        }        return res;    }};

è¿™ä¸ªåº”ç”¨åº”è¯¥æ•´ç†ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼š

Leetcode-792.åŒ¹é…å­åºåˆ—çš„å•è¯æ•°

// query_dfs// æšä¸¾å­—å…¸æ ‘æ¯ä¸€å±‚çš„å¯è¡Œè·¯å¾„ å»åŒ¹é…s, è€Œéå»å¯¹sè¿›è¡Œdfsvoid query_dfs(Trie* p,string& s,int pos){    // å½“å‰ä½ç½®å­˜åœ¨ç»“å°¾if (p->cnt) {        ans += p->cnt;        p->cnt = 0; // ç½®0ååˆ†é‡è¦ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å¤è®¡ç®—    }    for (int i = 0; i < 26; i ++) {        // å­˜åœ¨å­èŠ‚ç‚¹        if (p->son[i]) {            // å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œpos ~ next_posä¹‹é—´çš„å…¨å¤±æ•ˆ            int next_pos = s.find_first_of('a' + i, pos);            if (next_pos != string::npos) {                query_dfs(p->son[i], s, next_pos + 1);            }        }    }}

entry.title: 0x20å­—ç¬¦ä¸²-(2)-KMP
entry.content:
KMP

KMPç®—æ³•ç”¨äºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²åŒ¹é…ä¼˜åŒ–

å‡è®¾ä¸»ä¸²Sé•¿åº¦ä¸ºnï¼Œ æ¨¡å¼ä¸²Pé•¿åº¦ä¸ºm

#include <vector>#include <string>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;string s; // ä¸»ä¸²sstring p; // æ¨¡å¼ä¸²pvector<int> get_next(string& p) {    int m = p.size();        vector<int> nxt(m);    nxt[0] = -1;    for (int i = 1, j = -1; i < m; i ++) {        while (~j && p[i] != p[j + 1]) j = nxt[j];        if (p[i] == p[j + 1]) j ++;        nxt[i] = j;    }        return nxt;}vector<int> kmp(string& s, string& p) {    int n = s.size();    int m = p.size();        vector<int> res;    vector<int> nxt = get_next(p);    for (int i = 0, j = -1; i < n; i ++) {        while (~j && s[i] != p[j + 1]) j = nxt[j];        if (s[i] == p[j + 1]) j ++;        if (j == m - 1) {            // åŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸ            res.emplace_back(i - m + 1);  // åŒ¹é…æˆåŠŸæ—¶ï¼Œpåœ¨sçš„èµ·å§‹ä¸‹æ ‡            j = nxt[j];        }    }        return res;}int main() {     cin >> s; cin >> p;        vector<int> res = kmp(s, p);    for(auto& r : res) printf("%d ", r);    return 0;}

#include <string>#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;typedef unsigned long long ULL;const int N = 1e6 + 7;const int P = 131; // const int P = 13331;vector<ULL> P(N); // Pæ¬¡å¹‚vector<ULL> get_prefix_hash(const string& s) {int n = s.size();vector<ULL> h(n + 1);h[0] = 0;    p[0] = 1;for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {h[i] = h[i - 1] * P + s[i - 1];        p[i] = p[i - 1] * P;}return h;}ULL get_substr_hash(const vector<ULL>& h, int l, int r) {return h[r] - h[l - 1] * p[r - l + 1];}int main() {string s = "violet violence"; vector<ULL> h = get_prefix_hash(s);cout << "Prefix Hash of " << s << ":" << endl;for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i ++) {cout << s.substr(0, i + 1) << " : " << h[i + 1] << endl;}cout << endl;// è®¡ç®—violetçš„'viole' ä¸ violenceçš„'viole'çš„Hashå€¼æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒcout << get_substr_hash(h, 1, 5) << " and " << get_substr_hash(h, 8, 12) << endl;return 0;}

#include <string>#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;typedef unsigned long long ULL;const int P = 131; // const int P = 13331;ULL fast_pow(ULL x, ULL n) {    ULL res = 1;    for (; n; n >>= 1) {        if (n & 1) {            res = res * x;        }        x = x * x;    }      return res;}vector<ULL> get_prefix_hash(const string& s) {int n = s.size();vector<ULL> h(n + 1);h[0] = 0;for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {h[i] = h[i - 1] * P + s[i - 1];}return h;}ULL get_substr_hash(const vector<ULL>& h, int l, int r) {return h[r] - h[l - 1] * fast_pow(P, r - l + 1); // ä¸è¦ä½¿ç”¨(ULL)pow(P, r - l + 1); }int main() {string s = "violet violence"; vector<ULL> h = get_prefix_hash(s);cout << "Prefix Hash of " << s << ":" << endl;for (int i = 0; i < s.size(); i ++) {cout << s.substr(0, i + 1) << " : " << h[i + 1] << endl;}cout << endl;// è®¡ç®—violetçš„'viole' ä¸ violenceçš„'viole'çš„Hashå€¼æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒcout << get_substr_hash(h, 1, 5) << " and " << get_substr_hash(h, 8, 12) << endl;return 0;}

int get_max_common_prefix(string a, string b) {   vector<ULL> ha = get_prefix_hash(a);    vector<ULL> hb = get_prefix_hash(b);        int l = 0, r = min(a.size(), b.size());    while (l != r + 1) {        int mid = l + r >> 1;        if (get_substr_hash(ha, 0, mid - 1) != get_substr_hash(hb, 0, mid - 1)) {            // å‰ç¼€ä¸ç­‰ï¼Œç¼©å°len            r = mid - 1;        }        else {            // å‰ç¼€ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œæ‰©å¤§len            l = mid + 1;        }    }    return r; // è¿”å›æœ€é•¿å…¬å…±å‰ç¼€é•¿åº¦}

#include <deque>#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;typedef long long LL;const int N = 3e5 + 7;const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int n, m;vector<int> arr(N, 0);vector<LL> sum(N, 0);int main() {    cin >> n >> m;        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        scanf("%d", &arr[i]);    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + arr[i];    }        LL res = -INF;    deque<int> Q;    Q.push_back(0); // æ’å…¥sum[0]    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        while (!Q.empty() && i - Q.front() + 1 > m + 1) {            Q.pop_front();        }                res = max(res, sum[i] - sum[Q.front()]);                while(!Q.empty() && sum[Q.back()] >= sum[i]) {            Q.pop_back();        }        Q.push_back(i);    }        cout << res << endl;        return 0;}

#include <vector>#include <stack>#include <iostream>using namespace std;vector<int> arr;int n;int main() {    cin >> n;    arr.resize(n + 1);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        scanf("%d", &arr[i]);    }        vector<int> f(n + 1);    stack<int> S;    for (int i = n; i >= 1; i --) {        while (!S.empty() && arr[S.top()] <= arr[i]) {            S.pop(); // å¼¹å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶æ¯”å½“å‰æ•°å°çš„        }        // è¯´æ˜å½“å‰arr[S.top()] > arr[i]        f[i] = S.empty() ? 0 : S.top();        S.push(i);    }        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {        printf("%d ", f[i]);    }        return 0;}

Sarea=wâˆ—h=(râˆ’lâˆ’1)âˆ—(min(height[l],height[r])âˆ’height[cur])S_{area} = w * h = (r - l - 1) * (min(height[l], height[r]) - height[cur])Sareaâ€‹=wâˆ—h=(râˆ’lâˆ’1)âˆ—(min(height[l],height[r])âˆ’height[cur])

å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å½¢æˆå•è°·\/ï¼Œæ— æ³•æ¥åˆ°é›¨æ°´ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆéå†å®Œåç•™åœ¨å•è°ƒæ ˆä¸­çš„æ•°ä¸å¼¹å‡ºæ¥ä¹Ÿè¡Œï¼Œå¯¹è®¡ç®—ç»“æœæ— å½±å“ã€‚

#include <stack>#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;int n;vector<int> height;stack<int> S;int main() {    cin >> n;    height.resize(n);    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {        scanf("%d", &height[i]);    }    int res = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {        while (!S.empty() && height[S.top()] <= height[i]) {            int cur = S.top();            S.pop();            if (S.empty()) break;   // å·¦ä¾§ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ— æ³•æ„æˆå•è°·            int r = i;            int l = S.top();             res += (r - l - 1) * (min(height[r], height[l]) - height[cur]);        }        S.push(i);    }    cout << res << endl;    return 0;}

Sarea=wâˆ—h=(râˆ’lâˆ’1)âˆ—height[cur]S_{area} = w * h = (r - l - 1) * height[cur]Sareaâ€‹=wâˆ—h=(râˆ’lâˆ’1)âˆ—height[cur]

å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å½¢æˆå•å³°"/\ï¼Œå…¶å®å½“å‰å•ä¸ªä¸Šå‡åŒºé—´/ä¹Ÿèƒ½è®¡ç®—çŸ©å½¢é¢ç§¯ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±æœ‰å¿…è¦æŠŠéå†å®Œåç•™åœ¨å•è°ƒæ ˆä¸­çš„æ•°å…¨éƒ¨å¼¹å‡ºæ¥ç®—ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œä½†è¿™æ ·ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ä»£ç å†—ä½™ï¼ˆé€»è¾‘é‡å¤ï¼‰ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå°¾éƒ¨å“¨å…µæ¥ç»Ÿä¸€æ“ä½œã€‚

#include <stack>#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;typedef long long LL;vector<int> height;stack<int> S;int main() {    int n;    while (scanf("%d", &n), n) {        height.resize(n);                for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {            scanf("%d", &height[i]);        }                height.push_back(0);       // å°¾éƒ¨å“¨å…µ        n = height.size();        LL res = 0;        S = stack<int>();        for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {            while (!S.empty() && height[S.top()] >= height[i]) {                int cur = S.top();                S.pop();                int r = i;                  int l = S.empty() ? -1 : S.top();                res = max(res, (r - l - 1) * (LL)height[cur]);            }            S.push(i);        }               // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å°¾éƒ¨å“¨å…µï¼Œéœ€è¦æ·»åŠ ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼Œè®¡ç®—ç•™åœ¨å•è°ƒæ ˆä¸­çš„ä¸Šå‡åŒºé—´        // while (!S.empty()) {        //     int cur = S.top();        //     S.pop();        //     int r = n;          //     int l = S.empty() ? -1 : S.top();                   //     res = max(res, (r - l - 1) * (LL)height[cur]);        // }                cout << res << endl;    }        return 0;}

class Solution {public:    ListNode* reverseList(ListNode* head) {        ListNode* pre = NULL;        ListNode* cur = head;                while (cur != NULL) {            ListNode* nxt = cur->next;            cur->next = pre;            pre = cur;            cur = nxt;        }        return pre;    }};

class Solution {public:    ListNode* reverseBetween(ListNode* head, int left, int right) {        ListNode* dummy_head = new ListNode(-1, head);        ListNode* p = dummy_head;        int i = 1;        while (i < left) {            p = p->next;            i ++;        }        ListNode* pre = p;        ListNode* cur = p->next;        while (left <= i && i <= right) {            ListNode* nxt = cur->next;            cur->next = pre;            pre = cur;            cur = nxt;            i ++;        }                p->next->next = cur;        p->next = pre;        return dummy_head->next;    }};

#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;typedef pair<int, int> PII;const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int n;vector<PII> segs;void merge(vector<PII> &segs) {    vector<PII> res;        // step1: æŒ‰å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹å¯¹åŒºé—´æ’åº    sort(segs.begin(), segs.end());        // step2: æŒ‰é¡ºåºä¾æ¬¡æšä¸¾åŒºé—´    int st = -INF, ed = -INF;    for (int i = 0; i < segs.size(); i ++) {        // æ— äº¤é›†        if (ed < segs[i].first) {            if(st != -INF) res.push_back({st, ed});            st = segs[i].first, ed = segs[i].second;        }        // æœ‰äº¤é›†        else ed = max(ed, segs[i].second);    }    if(st != -INF) res.push_back({st, ed});    segs = res;}int main() {    cin >> n;        for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {        int l, r;        scanf("%d %d", &l, &r);        segs.push_back({l, r});    }        merge(segs);        cout << segs.size() << endl;        return 0;}

#include <vector>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;typedef pair<int, int> PII;const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int n;PII tar;vector<PII> segs;int main() {    cin >> tar.first >> tar.second;    cin >> n;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {        int l, r;        scanf("%d %d", &l, &r);        segs.push_back({l, r});    }    sort(segs.begin(), segs.end());    int res = 0;    bool flag = false;    int st = tar.first, ed = tar.second;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {        int j = i, r = -INF;        while  (j < n && segs[j].first <= st) {            r = max(r, segs[j].second);            j ++;        }        if (r < st) {            res = -1;            break;        }        res ++;        if (r >= ed)  {            flag = true;            break;        }        st  = r;        i = j - 1;    }    if (!flag) res = -1;    cout << res << endl;    return 0;}

#include <vector>#include <queue>#include <iostream>using namespace std;int n;int main() {    cin >> n;    priority_queue<int, vector<int>, greater<int>> pq;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {        int x;        scanf("%d", &x);        pq.push(x);    }        long long res = 0;    while(pq.size() != 1) {        int t1 = pq.top(); pq.pop();        int t2 = pq.top(); pq.pop();                int t = t1 + t2;        res += t;        pq.push(t);    }        cout << res << endl;    return 0;}

// ä¸€èˆ¬ä¼ å…¥å‚æ•°ä¼šç»™ä¸€ä¸ª vector<int> arr; é‚£ä¹ˆåº”è¯¥æ€ä¹ˆæ±‚å‰/åç¼€å’Œå‘¢ï¼Ÿclass Solution {public:    vector<int> preAndsuf(int arr) {        int n = arr.size();                // å‰ç¼€å’Œpre        vector<int> pre(n + 2); //pre(n + 1);ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ï¼Œç»Ÿä¸€n + 2        // åç¼€å’Œsuf        vector<int> suf(n + 2);        // pre        for (int i = 1, c = 0; i <= n; i ++) {pre[i] = pre[i - 1] + arr[i - 1];        }        // suf        for (int i = n, c = 0; i >= 1; i --) {            suf[i] = suf[i + 1] + arr[i - 1];        }        // ä½¿ç”¨1: åˆ©ç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œ/åç¼€å’Œï¼Œæ±‚arrä¸­åŒºé—´[l, r]çš„åŒºé—´å’Œ        int l = 0, r = n - 1;        int sum_lr = pre[r + 1] - pre[(l + 1) - 1]; // åˆ©ç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œæ±‚        int sum_lr = suf[l + 1] - suf[(r + 1) + 1]; // åˆ©ç”¨åç¼€å’Œæ±‚        // ä½¿ç”¨2: æ±‚å¯¹åº”ä½ç½®çš„å‰åç¼€å’Œä¹‹å’Œ        vector<int> res;        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {            res.emplace_back(pre[i] + suf[i]);        }        return res;    }};

class Solution {public:    vector<vector<int>> rangeAddQueries(int n, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {        // å·®åˆ†çŸ©é˜µ        vector<vector<int>> b(n + 2, vector<int> (n + 2, 0));                for (auto q : queries) {            // è¦æ•´ä½“åç§»1ä¸ªå•ä½ä¸‹æ ‡            int x1 = q[0] + 1, y1 = q[1] + 1;            int x2 = q[2] + 1, y2 = q[3] + 1;                        b[x1][y1] += 1;            b[x2 + 1][y1] -= 1;            b[x1][y2 + 1] -= 1;            b[x2 + 1][y2 + 1] += 1;        }                for (int i = 1; i <= n; i ++) {            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j ++) {                b[i][j] = b[i][j] + b[i - 1][j] + b[i][j - 1] - b[i - 1][j - 1];            }        }                     vector<vector<int>> res(n, vector<int> (n, 0));        for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {            for (int j = 0; j < n; j ++) {                res[i][j] = b[i + 1][j + 1];            }        }                return res;    }};

#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;// A + Bvector<int> add(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {vector<int> C;        int t = 0; // è¿›ä½    for (int i = 0; i < A.size() || i < B.size(); i ++) {        if (i < A.size()) t += A[i];        if (i < B.size()) t += B[i];                C.push_back(t % 10);        // æ ‡è®°æœ¬æ¬¡è¿ç®—æ˜¯å¦è¿›ä½ï¼Œç”¨äºä¸‹ä¸€ä½è¿ç®—        t /= 10;    }        // æœ€é«˜ä½è¿›ä½, å¦‚:11 + 99 = 110    if(t) C.push_back(t);         return C;}int main() {    string a, b;    vector<int> A, B;        cin >> a >> b;        for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');     for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');        auto C = add(A, B);        for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) printf("%d", C[i]);        return 0;}

#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;// åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æœ‰ A >= Bbool cmp(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    if (A.size() != B.size()) return A.size() > B.size();    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) {        if(A[i] != B[i]) {            return A[i] > B[i];        }    }        return true; }// A - B : é»˜è®¤ä¼ å…¥çš„A >= B, å¦‚æœA < Bï¼Œç®— -(sub(B, A))vector<int> sub(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    vector<int> C;        int t = 0; // å€Ÿä½    for (int i = 0; i < A.size() || i < B.size(); i ++) {        if (i < A.size()) t = A[i] - t;        if (i < B.size()) t -= B[i];                // C.push_back((t + 10) % 10); // å¯ä»¥ä»if-elseä¸­æå‡ºæ¥        // æ ‡è®°æœ¬æ¬¡è¿ç®—æ˜¯å¦å€Ÿä½ï¼Œç”¨äºä¸‹ä¸€ä½è¿ç®—        if (t > 0) {            C.push_back((t + 10) % 10);            t = 1;        }        else {            C.push_back(t); // ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å†™æˆC.push_back((t + 10) % 10);            t = 0;        }    }        // å»æ‰é«˜ä½çš„å¤šä¸ª0[åªä¿ç•™ä¸ªä½çš„0], å¦‚:123 - 120 = 003    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();        return C;}int main() {    string a, b;    vector<int> A, B;        cin >> a >> b;        for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');     for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');        if (cmp(A, B)) {        // A > B        auto C = sub(A, B);        for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) printf("%d", C[i]);}     else {        // B > A        auto C = sub(B, A);        printf("-");        for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) printf("%d", C[i]);}        return 0;}

#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;// A * bvector<int> mul(vector<int> &A, int b) {    vector<int> C;        int t = 0;    // å½“è¿›ä½tä¸º0æ—¶åœæ­¢å¾ªç¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœå»åé¢çš„[æœ€é«˜ä½è¿›ä½]å’Œ[å»æ‰é«˜ä½çš„å¤šä¸ª0]çš„æ“ä½œ    // for(int i = 0; i < A.size() || t; i ++) ï¼Œ    for(int i = 0; i < A.size(); i ++) {        t += A[i] * b;        C.push_back(t % 10);        t /= 10;}        // æœ€é«˜ä½è¿›ä½    if(t) C.push_back(t);    // å»æ‰é«˜ä½çš„å¤šä¸ª0[åªä¿ç•™ä¸ªä½çš„0], å¦‚:12345 * 0 = 00000;    while(C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();        return C;}int main() {    string a;    int b;        cin >> a >> b;        vector<int> A;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');        auto C = mul(A, b);            for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i --) printf("%d", C[i]);        return 0;}

// O(nm)// C = A * B, A >= 0, B >= 0vector<int> mul(const vector<int> &A, const vector<int> &B) {    vector<int> C(A.size() + B.size());    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {        for (int j = 0; j < B.size(); j++) {            C[i + j] += A[i] * B[j];        }    }    int t = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < C.size(); i++) {        t += C[i];        C[i] = t % 10;        t /= 10;    }    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();    return C;}

æœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§çš„é¢˜ç›®ä¸€å®šå¯ä»¥äºŒåˆ†ï¼Œ å¯ä»¥äºŒåˆ†çš„é¢˜ç›®ä¸ä¸€å®šéè¦æœ‰å•è°ƒæ€§(å¯ä»¥å…ˆsortæ„é€ å‡ºå•è°ƒæ€§)

æ›´æ–°l, rçš„æ€è·¯: æ¯æ¬¡æ›´æ–°åŒºé—´l,ræ—¶ï¼Œéƒ½è¦ä¿è¯targetåœ¨åŒºé—´å†…

  • arr[mid]ä¸tarï¼Œæˆ–è€…è¯´æ˜¯check(mid)å‡½æ•°:
    • check(mid)å‡½æ•°è¯¥æ€ä¹ˆå†™ï¼Œå¹¶å¯¹åº”æ›´æ–°åŒºé—´çš„å“ªä¸ªç«¯ç‚¹

..., idx_upper] target [idx_lower, ...

lower_boundæ¨¡æ¿

lower_bound(ä»¥targetä¸ºä¸‹ç•Œ: target [lower, ...è¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª[æ’å…¥targetåï¼Œarrä»ç„¶ä¿æŒæœ‰åº]çš„ä¸‹æ ‡

#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;int binary_search1(vector<int> &arr, int target) {    int l = 0, r = arr.size() - 1;        while (l != r + 1) {        int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;        if (arr[mid] >= target) {            // rçš„å³è¾¹(ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬r)å…¨å¤§äºç­‰äºtarget            r = mid - 1;        } else {            // lçš„å·¦è¾¹(ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬l)å…¨å°äºtarget            l = mid + 1;        }    }         return l; // return r + 1; // lower_bound}
åº”ç”¨: åœ¨æ•°ç»„arrä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°å¤§äºç­‰äºtargetçš„æœ€å°å€¼

#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;int binary_search2(vector<int> &arr, int target) {    int l = 0, r = arr.size() - 1;        while (l != r + 1) {        int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;        if (arr[mid] <= target) {            // lçš„å·¦è¾¹(ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬l)å…¨å°äºç­‰äºtarget            l = mid + 1;        } else {            // rçš„å³è¾¹(ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬r)å…¨å¤§äºtarget            r = mid - 1;        }    }         return r; // return l - 1;    // return l;    // upper_bound}
åº”ç”¨: åœ¨æ•°ç»„arrä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°å°äºç­‰äºtargetçš„æœ€å¤§å€¼

#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;vector<int> tmp;//è¦å¼€è¾Ÿä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„åšå½’å¹¶æ—¶çš„ä¸´æ—¶å­˜å‚¨void merge_sort(vector<int> &arr, int l, int r) {    // é€’å½’è¾¹ç•Œif (l >= r) return;        // step1    int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;        // step2    merge_sort(arr, l, mid);    merge_sort(, mid + 1, r);        // step3    int k = 0;// tmpæ•°ç»„ä¸­å·²ç»å½’å¹¶çš„å…ƒç´ æ•°é‡    int i = l, j = mid + 1;    while (i <= mid && j <= r) {        if (arr[i] <= arr[j]) tmp[k ++ ] = arr[i ++];        else tmp[k ++] = arr[j ++];    }    //å¤åˆ¶æœ«å°¾    while (i <= mid) tmp[k ++] = arr[i ++];    while (j <= r) tmp[k ++] = arr[j ++];    //å¤åˆ¶å›åŸæ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œè¦†ç›–    for (int i = l, j = 0; j < k; i ++, j ++) arr[i] = tmp[j];}int main() {int n;cin >> n;vector<int>arr(n);    tmp.resize(n);    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) scanf("%d", &arr[i]);merge_sort(arr, 0, n - 1);for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) printf("%d ", arr[i]);return 0;}

  2. åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªæœ‰åºå­åºåˆ—arr[lâˆ¼mid]{arr[l \sim mid]}arr[lâˆ¼mid]ä¸arr[mid+1âˆ¼r]{arr[mid + 1 \sim r]}arr[mid+1âˆ¼r]ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆiï¼Œjiï¼Œjiï¼Œjåˆ†åˆ«æ‰«æï¼Œå½“å‡ºç°arr[i]>arr[j]arr[i] > arr[j]arr[i]>arr[j]æ—¶ï¼Œè¯´æ˜arr[iâˆ¼mid]{arr[i \sim mid]}arr[iâˆ¼mid]ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ éƒ½ä¸arr[j]arr[j]arr[j]æ»¡è¶³é€†åºå¯¹ï¼Œæ•°é‡ä¸ºmidâˆ’i+1mid - i + 1midâˆ’i+1ã€‚

#include <vector>#include <iostream>using namespace std;typedef long long LL;const int N = 5e5 + 7;int n;vector<int> tmp;LL merge_sort(vector<int> &arr, int l, int r) {    if (l >= r) return 0;    int mid = l + (r - l) / 2;    LL res = merge_sort(arr, l, mid) + merge_sort(arr, mid + 1, r);    int k = 0;    int i = l, j = mid + 1;    while (i <= mid && j <= r) {        if (arr[i] <= arr[j]) tmp[k ++] = arr[i ++];        else {            tmp[k ++] = arr[j ++];            res += mid - i + 1; // ä»iåˆ°midå…¨æ˜¯æ»¡è¶³çš„é€†åºå¯¹        }    }    while (i <= mid) tmp[k ++] = arr[i ++];    while (j <= r) tmp[k ++] = arr[j ++];    for (int i = l, j = 0; j < k; i ++, j ++) arr[i] = tmp[j];    return res;}
